text: Happy summer fridays to you! EATING My grilled BBQ chicken sandwiches! And lemon zucchini bucatini. It’s a dream. DRINKING My whipped coconut cream cold brew. Yes please! MAKING My pesto smashed chickpea salad for lunch. And summer tortellini chicken salad. BAKING My sun dried tomato and herb scones. A savory scone is everything. CRAVING My hot honey tomato crostini. I could eat this every day! SNACKING On this week’s summer salmon spread. This is absolutely divine. GRILLING Grilled chicken parmesan. And zucchini corn orzo! And flaming hot cheetos hot dogs. READING Starting Totally and Completely Fine this weekend! What are you reading?! LISTENING To this new summer sparkle nights playlist. WEARING My black short nap dress all week! I’ve had the longer ones for years but I LOVE the short one too. It’s just so ridiculously comfortable. Also lived in my free people cardi all week. LOVING These brain teasers are SO fun to do with the kids. BUYING I bought this spill proof pitcher to make my kids lemonade – their current obsession. And this peach lip peptides gloss! I bought this dress in nantucket – it is so lightweight and cozy comfy. I also got these nike waffle sneakers that my cousin wore all week – they have a sheen to them and look SO cute with dresses and skirts. And this grey shirt jacket. SHOPPING Some of my nordstrom sale favorites! The supergoop sunscreen and coola sunscreen are both so good. And the osea body balm is the best. The mini longchamp is still my #1 pick! And the armani cheek duo – both shades I already mix and use every single day for blush. SHARING All of our back-to-school essentials! And back-to-school teacher essentials too.
html:
Happy summer fridays to you!

EATING

My grilled BBQ chicken sandwiches! And lemon zucchini bucatini. It’s a dream.

DRINKING

My whipped coconut cream cold brew. Yes please!

MAKING

My pesto smashed chickpea salad for lunch. And summer tortellini chicken salad.

BAKING

My sun dried tomato and herb scones. A savory scone is everything.

CRAVING

My hot honey tomato crostini. I could eat this every day!

SNACKING

On this week’s summer salmon spread. This is absolutely divine.

GRILLING

Grilled chicken parmesan. And zucchini corn orzo! And flaming hot cheetos hot dogs.

READING

Starting Totally and Completely Fine this weekend! What are you reading?!

LISTENING

To this new summer sparkle nights playlist.

WEARING

My black short nap dress all week! I’ve had the longer ones for years but I LOVE the short one too. It’s just so ridiculously comfortable. Also lived in my free people cardi all week.

LOVING

These brain teasers are SO fun to do with the kids.

BUYING

I bought this spill proof pitcher to make my kids lemonade – their current obsession. And this peach lip peptides gloss! I bought this dress in nantucket – it is so lightweight and cozy comfy. I also got these nike waffle sneakers that my cousin wore all week – they have a sheen to them and look SO cute with dresses and skirts. And this grey shirt jacket.

SHOPPING

Some of my nordstrom sale favorites! The supergoop sunscreen and coola sunscreen are both so good. And the osea body balm is the best. The mini longchamp is still my #1 pick! And the armani cheek duo – both shades I already mix and use every single day for blush.

SHARING

All of our back-to-school essentials! And back-to-school teacher essentials too.
